BUT OF MY FUCKING GOD, what a bloated piece of crap for a movie.  I have never seen a martial arts flick with more slow-motion shots of men crying than this one.  Most of the movie is a bunch of soap opera drama, with some fight scenes thrown in every half hour or so.

Hey China, if you want to make nationalist propaganda drivel, make it a national TV show.  Stop wasting the world's time with these 3 hour long tear-jerkers, trying to convince your people what a wonderful place they live in.

JESUS FUCKING CHRIST!!

okay, i feel a little better now.....

Oh, and while I'm complaining, why the hell won't people make subtitles that translate the notes that appear on the screen at various times???

This movie starts with a long written note, and has a dozen or so notes that appear on the screen at various times to explain something.  I don't know what they said 'cause I don't fucking read Chinese!  No wonder the movie made no fucking sense half the time.

Here's a clue for all you translators:  if I don't understand Chinese when I hear it spoken, then I sure as fuck don't fucking read Chinese either!!  
Does this make any fucking sense to you???

okay...  yeah, feeling much better now...  Peace on earth, y'all...
